name: HubspotUpdateListing
description:
Update specific details of a HubSpot listing.

This tool performs a partial update of a HubSpot listing identified by `listingId` or a unique property specified by `idProperty`. It overwrites provided property values, with errors for read-only or non-existent properties. Clear values by passing an empty string.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the listing to update in HubSpot.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the listing to be updated.

parameters.name: listing_update_properties
parameters.description: JSON object of key-value pairs representing properties of the listing to update. Clear values by passing an empty string.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

parameters.name: unique_property_name
parameters.description: The name of a unique property for this object, used for identification.

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: idProperty
parameters.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

parameters.name: listingId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the listing to be updated.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the listing to be updated.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
